title: Insurance Industry Paid $100 Billion in Claims Due to Pandemic
itunes:title: Insurance Industry Paid $100 Billion in Claims Due to Pandemic
description:
Hank Watkins, President of the Americas region of Lloyd's of London, discusses how the insurance industry has been impacted by the pandemic saying event cancellation accounted for 40% of claims.

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
